channel.title: Qt [epicurus remake] [need staff]
channel.description:
I wanted to bring back Epicurus, and yes this is the same exact source that Jayden used. The server is now going live, needing all players and staff. [Don't ask for staff, players will be selected upon needing]
Client download link: [url=http://up.ht/195MHkL]http://up.ht/195MHkL[/url]
[b]UNFORTUNATELY, IN ORDER TO GET CLIENT TO LOAD, YOU'LL NEED TO DOWNLOAD AND EXTRACT THIS CACHE INTO YOUR C: DRIVE[/b]: [url=http://up.ht/19682uz]http://up.ht/19682uz[/url] This is because my client doesn't auto-download the cache unless the cache is in your C: Drive.
It has everything the normal Epicurus had including EO and EPK worlds! ~Of course it has the working Grand Exchange too!~
Come test it out with me and make sure everything is in the best condition!
[B]Features[/B]: -[U]Grand Exchange[/U] -Flawless party room -Lottery -Dicing -Multiple world support -Cross-world player list support -Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently) -Flawless duel arena, with staking -Flawless shopping system -Flawless banking system, with searching. -Flawless farming system -PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc -Rank Icon changing system -Flawless loyalty title system -New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc. -Perfect curse system -Weapon combination selection in duel arena -Special client ::brony mode :)
[B]PICTURES:[/B] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gaQ1[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gaRC[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gaSl[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gaTi[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gaTy[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gb0H[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gb2c[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gb4E[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gbyb[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/2gbAh[/img]

item.title: Qt [epicurus remake] [need staff]
item.dc:creator: @JuMpDRoP JuMpDRoP
item.description:
@JuMpDRoP wrote:

I wanted to bring back Epicurus, and yes this is the same exact source that Jayden used. The server is now going live, needing all players and staff.
[Don’t ask for staff, players will be selected upon needing]

Client download link: http://up.ht/195MHkL

UNFORTUNATELY, IN ORDER TO GET CLIENT TO LOAD, YOU’LL NEED TO DOWNLOAD AND EXTRACT THIS CACHE INTO YOUR C: DRIVE: http://up.ht/19682uz
This is because my client doesn’t auto-download the cache unless the cache is in your C: Drive.

It has everything the normal Epicurus had including EO and EPK worlds!
~Of course it has the working Grand Exchange too!~

Come test it out with me and make sure everything is in the best condition!

Features:
-Grand Exchange
-Flawless party room
-Lottery
-Dicing
-Multiple world support
-Cross-world player list support
-Cross-world clan chat (only in the World clan chat, currently)
-Flawless duel arena, with staking
-Flawless shopping system
-Flawless banking system, with searching.
-Flawless farming system
-PK leaderboards with kill/death ratios, etc
-Rank Icon changing system
-Flawless loyalty title system
-New skill interface, with perfect EXP to next level, etc.
-Perfect curse system
-Weapon combination selection in duel arena
-Special client ::brony mode

PICTURES:


2gaSl771×533




2gb2c771×533

2gb4E771×533
